HNR#15
(twenty 1s next to beginning, then +4, +4)
31707 C         o111111111111111111110111011101010101011101011111010111010101011101111111010101010101011
32275 C     o1111111111111111111111110111011101011101011101011111010111010101011101111111010101010101011
33419 C o11111111111111111111111111110111011101011111011101011111010111010101011101111111010101010101011
step differences 568, 1144
It's changing bits that you didn't see! The analysis that follows is ill-sighted.
Instead, we have to make an acceleration for it that is capable of projecting it until it counts all the way up.

Let's try it on a smaller version of the same thing: sixteen 1s.
B1L H1L  C1L B1R  D1R E1L  B1R D0R  A1L C0L
Oo11111111111111110111011101010101011101011111010111010101011101111111010101010101011O C
output:
  0 C     o11111111111111110111011101010101011101011111010111010101011101111111010101010101011
280 C o111111111111111111110111011101110101011101011111010111010101011101111111010101010101011
didn't work!!

Four 1s?
0 C      o11110111011101010101011101011111010111010101011101111111010101010101011
9 B      100001111o11101010101011101011111010111010101011101111111010101010101011 is the furthest right
28 C o111111110111111101010101011101011111010111010101011101111111010101010101011
actually doesn't work, because the sticky zero was changed.

Eight 1s?
     o111111110111011101010101011101011111010111010101011101111111010101010101011 C
41 B 10001000011111111o1010101011101011111010111010101011101111111010101010101011
64 C i111111110111010111010101011101011111010111010101011101111111010101010101011
changed the bit, doesn't work.

8	12	16	20	24
64	136	280	568	1144

Zero 1s?
     o0111011101010101011101011111010111010101011101111111010101010101011 C, analytic
 0 C o0111011101010101011101011111010111010101011101111111010101010101011
10 C i0101111101010101011101011111010111010101011101111111010101010101011
doesn't work.

So the lemma is as follows:
For all N â‰¥ 0, HNR#15 turns
o(1111)^(  N)11111111011101110x C into
o(1111)^(1+N)11111111011111110x C
in a_n steps, where a_0 = 64 and a_(n+1) = 2a_n + 8.
